languages.text: "Будьте осторожнее с пустыми угрозами". {n}Марево отражающего поля окружает фигуру Лорд-инквизитора. Ксавьер Калькасар бросает на вас тяжелый взгляд.{/n} "Помните, я говорил, что готов закрывать глаза на некоторые вольности? Это была первая. И — последняя такого рода".

"Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."
languages.original_text: "Будьте осторожнее с пустыми угрозами". {n}Марево отражающего поля окружает фигуру Лорд-инквизитора. Ксавьер Калькасар бросает на вас тяжелый взгляд.{/n} "Помните, я говорил, что готов закрывать глаза на некоторые вольности? Это была первая. И — последняя такого рода".

traits.locale_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a deflector field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

"Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a deflector field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

"Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a deflector field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

"Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

languages.text: “当心你这些空洞的威胁。”{n}大审判官的身型被笼罩在偏转立场的阴霾之中，他用凝重的目光看着你。{/n}“还记得我之前说过，我愿意以包容的态度对待某些自由裁量的结果吗？那是第一次，也是最后一次。”
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: “当心你这些空洞的威胁。”{n}审判长的身型被笼罩在偏转立场的阴霾之中，他用凝重的目光看着你。{/n}“还记得我之前说过，我愿意以包容的态度对待某些自由裁量的结果吗？那是第一次，也是最后一次。”

languages.text: «Tenga cuidado con estas amenazas vanas». {n}Un campo refractor brota en torno al Lord Inquisidor, volviendo borroso el aire que lo rodea. Te mira intensamente.{/n} «¿Recuerda que le dije que le permitiría ciertas libertades? Esta ha sido una. Y será la única de este tipo».
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: «Tenga cuidado con estas amenazas vanas». {n}Un campo deflector brota en torno al Lord Inquisidor, volviendo borroso el aire que lo rodea. Te mira intensamente.{/n} «¿Recuerda que le dije que le permitiría ciertas libertades? Esta ha sido una. Y será la única de este tipo».

languages.text: 「中身のない脅迫をするなら、慎重に事を進めたまえ」{n}リフラクター・フィールドの霧がロード・インクィジターを包み込む。カルカサルがなじるような視線を投げかける。{/n}「ある程度の自由は目こぼししてやると言っただろ？あれが最初で最後だ」
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: 「中身のない脅迫をするなら、慎重に事を進めたまえ」{n}リフラクター・フィールドの霧がロード・インクィジターを包み込む。カルカサルがなじるような視線を投げかける。{/n}「ある程度の自由は目こぼししてやると言っただろ？あれが最初で最後だ」

languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

languages.text: "Seid vorsichtig mit derlei haltlosen Drohungen." {n}Der Schleier eines Refraktorfeldes umhüllt den Großinquisitor. Er wirft dir einen strengen Blick zu.{/n} "Wisst Ihr noch, dass ich sagte, ich würde bestimmte Freiheiten übersehen, die Ihr Euch nehmt? Das war die erste. Und zugleich auch die letzte."
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: "Seid vorsichtig mit derlei hohlen Drohungen." {n}Der Schleier eines Deflektorfelds umhüllt den Großinquisitor. Er wirft dir einen strengen Blick zu.{/n} "Wisst Ihr noch, dass ich sagte, ich würde bestimmte Freiheiten übersehen, die Ihr Euch nehmt? Das war die erste. Und zugleich auch die letzte."

languages.text: « Vous ne devriez pas proférer des menaces à la légère. » {n}Un champ réfracteur enveloppe le seigneur inquisiteur. Le regard qu'il pose sur vous est lourd de menaces.{/n} « Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue} que je ferais preuve d'indulgence s'il vous prenait l'envie de prendre quelques libertés. Je vais donc faire abstraction de ce premier incident. À vous de faire en sorte qu'il n'y en ait jamais de second. »
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne devriez pas proférer des menaces à la légère. » {n}Un bouclier déflecteur enveloppe le seigneur inquisiteur qui vous fixe avec intensité.{/n} « Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue} que je ferais preuve d'indulgence s'il vous prenait l'envie de prendre quelques libertés. Je vais donc faire abstraction de ce premier incident. À vous de faire en sorte qu'il n'y en ait jamais de second. »

languages.text: "Boş tehditler savururken daha dikkatli olmalısın." {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun çevresi, ışıkkıran alanının pusuyla kaplanıyor.{/n} "Belli imtiyazları görmezden gelmeye hazır olduğumu söylediğimi hatırlıyor musun? Bu ilki ve bu türden imtiyazların sonuncusuydu."
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully with these hollow threats." {n}The haze of a refractor field envelops the Lord Inquisitor. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember I said I would be willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: "Bu boş tehditler konusunda daha dikkatli olmalısın." {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun çevresi ışıkkıran alanının pusuyla kaplanıyor.{/n} "Belli imtiyazları görmezden gelmeye hazır olduğumu söylediğimi hatırlıyor musun? Bu birincisiydi ve bu türden imtiyazların sonuncusuydu."
